languages.text: [draft]The Psyker uses Willpower instead of {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} for calculating {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon damage, levels of skills, ranged weapon {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}recoil{/g}, and effects of {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} that rely on Strength.

traits.locale_text: [draft]The Psyker uses Willpower instead of Strength for calculating melee weapon damage, levels of skills, ranged weapon recoil, and effects of abilities and talents that rely on Strength.
